attributes.action: Reduce GP waiting times to 1 Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like waiting times to see GP reduced to 1 working Day. Currently in London, I have to wait 1 week on average to see my GP. This level of service for Developed country is UN-ACCEPTABLE.
Especially people who are paying TAX should have priority during Early morning and Late Evening to see their GPs, as People on Benifits and Pensioners can be seen during "OFF Peak" Hours. Any Emergancies could be delt by Hospitals or Dedicated Emergancy Surgeries.
